review: The Fire TV Stick is amazing! I used to hog the PlayStation if I wanted to watch Netflix or Hulu but now they are all at my fingertips with the Fire stick.  On the down side, some of the third party apps suck because they are riddled with ads!!!!  In some cases the long commercials play every 2mins while you're trying to enjoy a show.  Ads Really Suck third party app makers!!! And they are a huge TURN OFF!  Please ease up on the ads,  we get it already!
author: Stephen

review: The Fire TV Stick was easy to install and it works well.  The only issue I have is that I have Klipsch Speakers and for some reason I cannot get the audio to connect to my speakers.  I was on a Chat for over 25 minutes and to no avail.  The tech support did try several options but nothing seemed to work.  So while I love it, i am disappointed as it loses the theater-like atmosphere..
